descriptions:
['DescriptionStrategically located between Abu Dhabi and Dubai, AlJurf is setting the pace and will be credited as the destination that introduced a truly unique concept to the UAE market, ushering in a new form of community living, and setting the future of life in Sahel El Emarat.  
Spanning over 380 hectares and boasting 1.6 kms of sea front and another 1.6 km of breakwater on the Arabian Gulf, AlJurf is a unique waterfront mixed-use development. The destination is anticipated to dramatically pave the way for Sahel El Emarat. 
Once completed, AlJurf will feature a range of facilities and amenities, including a world-renowned wellness clinic and retreat, unique residential communities and serviced residences, a marina and a town center encompassing a hotel and retail units. 
This is a second home destination, far from the bustle of urban life. AlJurf Gardens harnesses nature’s raw beauty and combines it with refined heritage-inspired architecture and contemporary design to present a sanctuary of wellness and calm. Secluded residential villas and land plots cluster close to a central community hub in the midst of a nature reserve to reinterpret The Great Past of Tomorrow.
PAYMENT PLANS:
6 to 9 years post-handover payment plans available
- Till completion : 
Land Plots
20% on Signing SPA
80% until Handover
Villas
10% on Signing SPA
90% Until Handover
- 6/7 Years Payment Plan
10% on Signing the SPA
30% on the Construction Completion/On Handover
60% over 9 Semi Annual Installments
- 8/9 Years Payment Plan
10% on Signing the SPA
30 % on the Construction Completion/On Handover
60% over 13 Semi Annual Installments']

descriptions: ['DescriptionAbode Property are pleased to market this amazing 2 Bedroom unit in the well located & highly requested Marina Gate 2, Dubai Marina.This exclusive 2 bedroom apartment is located on a low floor and is one of the most favoured units due to its layout, floor level & amazing Marina & Seal view.Entering the apartment in to a hallway bellowing with light, passing the cloak area & powder room into the modern fitted kitchen complete with gas oven, cooker and integrated electrical appliances. The living area is filled with light granted from the floor to ceiling panoramic windows spanning the whole of the spacious living/dining area, leading to the balcony with boast an amazing view. Floor to ceiling windows, built in wardrobes & en-suite bathroom.The property is already Long Term Rented Out with very High Rental Yield, representing a great Investor Deal.Amenities:> Infinity Pool> Indoor & Outdoor Gym> Basketball & Paddle Tennis Court> Kids Splash Pool/Play area> Tram & Metro> Beach> SZR> Private & Guest Parking> Shops> Promenade AccessFor more information call Mattia +971565775168 or visit www.abodeproperty.ae']

descriptions: ["DescriptionThe 3 Bedroom Townhouses with coastal views in Sur La Mere are an extremely rare set of properties which neighbour the highly anticipated Port de la Mere; is also brought you by Meraas. \xa0Take advantage of the low priced real estate market now! These properties are prime, rare and some of the very last full coastal and sea view townhouses to be built in Dubai. First come, first served.  * Selling Price: AED 4,400,00 * Built Up Area: 3,705 Square Feet * +190 berth marina & yacht club * Flexible Payment Plan * Ready to move in by 2021 * Premium Amenities * Sea & Skyline Views * Private Beach Access and Marina Access * Located in one of the most sought after districts in Jumeirah 1 * 5 bedroom plus maid's with en-suite bathrooms * Unparalleled shopping, dining, and hospitality experiences, along with leisure, entertainment, and convenience options Residents of this community will have easy access to La Mer, a water front strip of retail and f&b outlets, as well as a waterpark. Prime location, spacious layouts, and payment plan make it attractive to end-users and investors. Contact San our specialist today for more info at\xa0+971562466806 | 800 DANDB |\xa0www.dandbdubai.com D&B Properties is a leading real estate company in the Intl Off-Plan market incl London, Dubai & Abu Dhabi We assist in every aspect of searching & securing residential off-plan property."]
